Package guiSET.core

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Animation
    Animations enable the user of the library to create transitions of numeric values easily.
    Button
    Basic button template for text or image buttons.
    Checkbox
    Standard checkbox that allows to display some text to the right of the checkbox.
    Color
    Mostly a copy of processings color stuff.
    Container
    Base class for all containers.
    ContextMenu
    Create a tool/menu strip outside the main menu, i.e. for dropdown menus that open upon rightclick.
    Control
    (Abstract) Base class for all other visual components.
    Control.Setter<T>  
    FlowContainer
    A Container that layouts its content from left to right and top to bottom.
    Frame
    Master Container that fills out entire sketch and controls the flow of events and rendering of the GUI.
    HFlowContainer
    A Container that layouts its content horizontally.
    HScrollContainer
    A Container that layouts its content horizontally and enables a scrollbar if the content overflows.
    KeyListener
    Nothing the otto-normal-user should worry about.
    Label
    A basic template for plain text or image labels.
    ListItem
    Optimal item to add to ListView as it features firing the itemSelected event of ListView.
    ListView
    The list view allows to display easily a lot of items in a vertical list.
    MenuBar
    Top bar for menu strips which automatically fills out parent, has special menu height and a greyish background gradient.
    MenuItem  
    MenuParser
    Parse a string as menu.
    MenuSeparator
    Separator line in menus between MenuItems MenuItem.
    MenuTextbox
    A MenuItem that allows entering text.
    MultilineTextbox
    The MultilineTextbox allows entering and pasting multi-line text.
    PasswordTextbox
    This is a textbox where all chars will be displayed with the passwordChar character.
    ScrollArea
    A Container that allows both horizontal and vertical scrolling if the content exceeds the ScrollAreas size.
    Shortcut
    Class for storing keyboard shortcuts.
    Slider
    A value slider/progress bar.
    Switch
    Switch class derived from Checkbox that looks more like an android switch and has a toggeling animation.
    TextBased
    Abstract base class for all components that display text.
    Textbox
    A single-line Textbox that behaves just as you would expect one to behave.
    VFlowContainer
    A Container that layouts its content vertically.
    VScrollContainer
    A Container that layouts its content vertically and enables a scrollbar if the content overflows.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Control.ImageMode  
    Control.RenderingMethod  
    Frame.DrawMode  
    Frame.DrawTime  
    Frame.Initialization_State  
    Slider.Orientation
